attributes.title: Clover Food Truck (Weekly Consumption)
attributes.description:
Created on May 28, 2010 by geng_tan on Sourcemap.org:

Reference 

Picture

attributes.name: Eggs
attributes.title: Eggs
attributes.description:
link

300 people served per day. 5 days a week, 100 breakfast, 1/2 egg per breakfast, 200 lunch, 1/2 egg per lunch, 1/10 lb per egg, 
150/10/2

attributes.name: Coffee
attributes.title: Coffee
attributes.description:
link

300 people served per day. 5 days a week, 100 breakfast, 1 cup of coffee per breakfast, 200 lunch, half of lunch eaters get 1 cup of coffee.
200 cups of coffee total. 10 gr per cup. 200*10/1000*5

attributes.name: yogurt
attributes.title: yogurt
attributes.description:
link

300 people served per day. 5 days a week, 100 breakfast, 75 of them order an yogurt, 1/4 lb per yogurt 75*1/4*1/2*5

Embodied CO2 estimated using milk(0.95 KG/Unit)

attributes.name: Bread
attributes.title: Bread
attributes.description:
link

300 people served per day. 5 days a week, 200 lunch, 1 bread per lunch, 1/2 lb per bread, 100 breakfast, 25 bread during bread fast. 3/4 lb per bread.  
(200*1/2 25*1/2)*5*1/2

attributes.name: Potatoes
attributes.title: Potatoes
attributes.description:
link

300 people served per day. 5 days a week, 200 lunches, 75 of them order fries. 1/4 lb per fry. = 75*1/4*5

attributes.name: Corn Oil
attributes.title: Corn Oil
attributes.description:
estimate: ~2 kg of Oil per week

Embodied CO2 1 KG per unit

attributes.name: Polystyrene Utensils
attributes.title: Polystyrene Utensils
attributes.description:
Plastic Cups, Napkins, Forks, and plates

300 people served per day. 5 days a week, 1 set of utensil per person, 1/20 lb per utensil set,

attributes.name: Tofu
attributes.title: Tofu
attributes.description:
300 people served per day. 5 days a week, 200 lunch, 100 of them contain tofu, 1/10 lb of tofu per serving. 100*1/10*5/2

embodied CO2 from soy bean

attributes.name: Tomatoes
attributes.title: Tomatoes
attributes.description:
Based on a comment from a Clover Employee

300 people served per day. 5 days a week, 200 lunch sandwich, 3/4 lb per tomato, 1/3 tomato per sandwich, 5*200*3/4*1/3/2

attributes.name: Lettuce
attributes.title: Lettuce
attributes.description:
link
300 people served per day. 5 days a week, 200 lunch, 150 of them contain lettuce, 1/10 lb of lettuce per serving. 150*1/10*5/2

attributes.name: Carrots
attributes.title: Carrots
attributes.description: 300 people served per day. 5 days a week, 200 lunch, 150 of them contain carrot, 1/10 lb of carrot per serving. 150*1/10*5/2

attributes.name: Aluminum Foil
attributes.title: Aluminum Foil
attributes.description: Everyone uses 18 inch by 1 ft of aluminum foil. 300 people a day, 5 days a week. 18 inch by 1500 ft.

attributes.name: Chickpea
attributes.title: Chickpea
attributes.description:
link
300 people served per day. 5 days a week, 100 people each chickpeas per day, 1/20 lb of chickpea per person, 100*5*1/20*1/2

Estimated embodied CO2 1KG per unit
